welcomeSentences: Your limitation is only your imagination.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
The only constant in software is change
All code is guilty until proven innocent.

bugfixes: #4567 fixed timezone strip error

features.title: #4428(note-33) Added column to store selected element
features.description: Selected element source will be stored in the column 'Target_Source' when preparing the dataset. This new column is added to enhance the dataset for AI feature

features.title: #4567 Set timezone of feature execution environment/Selenoid Browsers
features.description: Select a timezone that matches your testing requirements to simulate different timezones during your tests.

bugfixes: #4529 - Rename step to "Scroll to element with "{selector}" in AG Grid table "{scrollable_element_selector}"
#4557 - The issue of unavailable logs has been fixed on the feature report screen.
#4553 - Updated Additional Information section in pdf page with better description
#4548 - Fixed: Selected sorting will not be lost when variables are modified
#4545 - Fixed: Now, API calls will use the proxy settings if a proxy is configured in Cometa
#4537 - Fixed: Bash Error "too many arguments"
#4540 - Fixed scrollable screen in the Admin Manage Account section.

features.title: Added 'Additional Information' page in PDF report
features.description: You can find the table containing information about the symbols or short forms used in this report on the last page of the PDF report. 'REL. TIME' is explained there.

features.title: Download your data from admin portal
features.description: You can download your dataset from the admin portal. A link with 'Click to download Dataset' is created

features.title: Stop test data driven tests
features.description: A feature has been implemented to stop data-driven tests. Tests running in data-driven mode can now be halted using the stop button provided alongside the list of data-driven tests.

bugfixes: #4433 - No host specified error fixed

features.title: #4496 Created hover on any option in edit feature
features.description: Display a message when the user hovers over any checkbox in the information section

features.title: Add the list of vulnerable headers from the backend.
features.description: Dependency on code change has been removed to set the vulnerable headers. They can now be updated using the Django admin panel.

features.title: If there are no execution logs for the feature and the user clicks on the log button, display the message..
features.description: If there are no execution log feature and user clicks on logs button show message " There are no logs for this feature. Please execute the feature and then review the logs. If you think this is a bug, please let us know. "

features.title: View the total execution time and relative time for each step in the PDF report.
features.description: In the report, both the total feature execution time and relative time can be observed, facilitating a better understanding of the results.

bugfixes: #4481 - Fixed the results order in the results executions CSV file. Added new column to better understand the steps order.

features.title: View the relative time for the Cometa step reports.
features.description: Check the step execution time to understand at which second each step was executed. In case of an error in any step, this will help to correlate the step execution with the recorded video.

features.title: Security feature has been implemented to analyze network responses.
features.description: During the execution of the test, network responses containing vulnerable headers can be analyzed in the report by enabling the Network Logging option in the create feature screen. Additionally, information for all network response headers will be available within the step reports. The report can be analyzed using a JSON viewer.

features.title: Enhanced Browser Performance Control
features.description: Take charge of your browsing experience! With the latest update, you can now effortlessly boost your performance testing by choosing how many times a browser should run concurrently. Fine-tune your settings for a smoother and more efficient online testing experience.

features.title: Enhance Installscript
features.description: Installation script will check for disk space and user-level resource limits for processes befor installing cometa

features.title: New steps implemented to scroll to different elements
features.description: New steps implemented -> u'Scroll to the last position of the desired element identified by "{xpath}" with maximum number of scrolls "{MaxScrolls}" and maximum time of  "{MaxTimeOfLife}" and Scroll to element with "{selector}" in lazy loaded table "{scrollable_element_selector}"

features.title: Meta Data Information implementation for steps
features.description: Multiline Meta Data information implementation for actions is implemented, complete text will be avaiable in the help section

features.title: New step implemented to appear and disappear loader
features.description: New step implemented -> Wait "{timeout}" seconds for "{selector}" to appear and disappear using option "{do not fail if not visible|fail if never visible}"

features.title: Downloading multiple files within a feature. Issue fixed
features.description: Download multiple files within the feature. Only the file downloaded with the step will be attached to the step report.

features.title: Delete the downloaded files using the step.
features.description: Files can be deleted while executing the feature. Use regular expression to select files with the step 'Delete files matching "{pattern}" from the local download folder.'

features.title: Browser Logs in feature results
features.description: Console Logs can now be viewed using 'Fetch Console.log from Browser and attach it to the feature result' step.

features.title: Page Source in feature results
features.description: Page source can now be viewed using 'Fetch HTML Source of current Browser page and attach it to the feature result' step.

features.title: REST API Testing
features.description: REST API Testing is now possible in Co.meta! Please use API steps in your features.

features.title: Parsed description in feature results
features.description: Parsing feature description to fesults view, variables used in feature description will be parsed before the execution.

features.title: Main V2 as Default Dashboard
features.description: Defaulting to new dashboard, old view has been moved to the sidebar menu.

features.title: Data Driven Test
features.description: Data Driven Test has been implemented and is now visiable on the left sidebar as "Data Driven".

features.title: New step to highlight elements in screenshot
features.description: Highlight element with "{selector}", will highlight with an outline the element found with selector, which will be displayed in the screenshot.

bugfixes: Feature id repeated twice in tree view.
Feature results are deleted after feature execution has been fixed.
Fixed if uploaded file after decryption was not removed it threw an error on the next executions.
Feature results are not removed if feature run is removed, feature runs are no longer in use.
Added logging to gunicorn process.
Fixed max step timeout value from 1000s to 7200s.
Now showing warning when step timeout is invalid.
Updated the logic for the 'I cannot see element' step.

features.title: New Step: Double Click
features.description: Double click on elements is now possible!

bugfixes: Department variables were not being picked up.
Added link to public github documentation in help section.
When uploading a file the filename should be the same as the file saved in the Upload tab.

features.title: New Step: Custom Error Message
features.description: Set custom error messages that will show up on the live preview, step view as well as in PDF report.

features.title: Screenshot open on pixel difference click.
features.description: Clicking on the pixel difference will open up the pixel difference screenshot in the step view.

features.title: Return to Main view
features.description: Added 'Return to Main view' in feature result view.

bugfixes: Updated translations for 'Integrations' field.

features.title: Screenshot icon on step view.
features.description: Screenshot icon has been added next to the pixel difference in step view.

bugfixes: Adding feature id as prefix to the feature name in tree view.
Feature icon will be set to gray color if feature is checked with depends on other features.

features.title: Screenshot of failed step.
features.description: Screenshot will be taken on failed steps even though checkbox is not marked.

bugfixes: Browser does not stop if time limit is exceeded while loading the page.
Changed the max timout value in front from 1000s to 7200s (2 hours).

features.title: Undefined Steps
features.description: Undefined steps now throw an error in Live Preview.

features.title: Step Timeouts
features.description: Test Managers now can update step timeouts of a department in batch.

features.title: Welcome tour
features.description: Fixed - welcome tour presentation didn't stop on ESC key press

features.title: Default feature step
features.description: From now on, whenever user creates new feature, default step - 'StartBrowser and call URL {url}' will be automatically inserted into it's steps.

features.title: Variable creation
features.description: Users can now create variable even if feature creation is not finished, but in this case variable can only be based on department or environment.

features.title: Folder tree
features.description: Fixed - Folder tree hierarchy layout is broken if name is too long.

features.title: Variable table column selection
features.description: Users can now choose which columns must be displayed in variables table

features.title: Variable insertion into new feature
features.description: User can no make use of variable insertion even when currently edit feature is still not created

features.title: Variable replacement
features.description: User can now insert variable into step by clicking on desired variable in flyout, or alternatively by pressing enter on selected variable

features.title: Variable filter popup
features.description: User can now make use of live variable filter popup to accurately insert variable names in steps. Popup will appear once user replaces '{anything}' with '$'

features.title: New step: I cannot see
features.description: With this new step we can easily assert negative assumptions. So, not seeing a given selector is positive. For examaple, use this for testing the absence of elements when checking on access-rights.

features.title: Preselect Feature Options
features.description: You can preselect feature options such as department, application, environment and record video when ever creating new features. These options can be changed in User settings.

features.title: New step: I cannot see
features.description: With this new step we can easily assert negative assumptions. So, not seeing a given selector is positiv. For exmaple, use this for testing the absense of elements when checking on access-rights.

bugfixes: Typo fix from the step context menu.

features.title: Upload Files
features.description: You can now upload files to co.meta and use these files in upload file steps.

features.title: Added step: Open {excelfile} and compare the number of rows in the {column} column, starting from row {starting_row}, to ensure that there are {total_rows} rows with option {option}
features.description: Assert the number of rows to match the number of rows specified, possible options are: do not count empty cells or include empty cells.

features.title: Javascript function return variable
features.description: If the Javascript function step has a return value, this value can now be used in co.meta using '%js_return' parameter.

bugfixes: #3931 - Fixed sub-folders were not being created inside the selected folder.

features.title: Added step: Add a timestamp to the {prefix} and save it to {variable_name}
features.description: Adds timestamp to the prefix specified so the string becomes unique.

features.title: Added step: Create a string of random {x} numbers and save to {variable_name}
features.description: Create a string of x random numbers.

bugfixes: #3828 - Fixed height issues when showing paginated rows.
#3828 - Fixed 'View Logs' button not working.
#3826 - Test list step now generated a CSV file even thought selector was empty or not found.
#3826 - Fixed Test list step to show correctly the values when using partial as option.

features.title: Updated step: Edit {file} and set {value} to {cell}
features.description: Updated edit excel step to now edit csv files as well. Supported extensions are: XLSX, XLS & CSV. CSV only supports UTF-8.

features.title: New step: Attach {filename} from Downloads folder to current execution results
features.description: Added a new step to attach files to the execution results fo later investigation. Please read the documentation for more details. https://github.com/cometa-rocks/cometa_documentation/blob/main/cometa_actions.md

bugfixes: Fixed upload of multiple files by separating files with semicolon.

features.title: New steps: Open Excel and assert, Open Excel and set environment variable to value from cell
features.description: Added new step to updated an excel file. Please read the documentation for more details. https://github.com/cometa-rocks/cometa_documentation/blob/main/cometa_actions.md

features.title: New steps: Edit Excel Files
features.description: Added new step to updated an excel file. Please read the documentation for more details.

features.title: New steps: Download a file + Upload a File
features.description: Added exiting new steps to upload and download files. Please read the documentation for more details.

features.title: Multiple http request
features.description: Fixed step edit component realizing multiple http requests when it has another feature dependency step

features.title: Folder tree
features.description: Fixed folder tree's unpersistent behaviour

features.title: Sidebar
features.description: New Animation for MAIN V.2 landing sidebar navigation

bugfixes: #3426 - Fixed chart diagram is displayed from the starting from first feature result, now it will be displayed when there are at least 10
#3449 - Fixed default settings in user panel are not persistent
#3461 - Fixed searchbar doesnt close when searching via click on search icon.
#3470 - Fixed When new dashboard in is deactivated, a click on every folder tree item apart from departments and its content, redirects to /search.
#3470 - Fixed browser bookmarks not working if the last click before closing the app was performed on home, recent, starred, trash bin or team drives.
#3467 - Fixed department id not updating when moving feature from department to another department's folder.
#3467 - Fixed when moving feature from folder to another, it is not moved but copied(creates duplicate)
#3467 - Fixed when moving feature from folder to department, action is not realized

features.title: Department users
features.description: Users with permissions to view the department panel are now able to view users inside each departments.

bugfixes: #xxxx - New step 'Search for "{something}" in IBM Cognos and click on first result'
#xxxx - New step for hit OK button on popup message like alert, cofirm or prompt window.
#3346 - Added Type column to sort maintain the old view of folders on top then features and finally feature that depend on others.

#3343 - Fixed where in new landing moved/hidden columns are reset after page reload.
#3343 - Fixed where after executing a feature, folder with the same id as feature will show running state on status column.

features.title: Live Preview
features.description: Live preview has been added to co.meta! To view live your testcases click on TV icon next to Browser name on live step view.

features.title: Move and modify folders
features.description: We have added some improvements on folder, you can now see to which department a folder belongs to, modify it and move a folder inside other folders.

features.title: Test duration
features.description: We have added a duration timer in the Live Steps viewer.

features.title: Payments
features.description: We have added a subscription based system. For the moment it is deactivated in Prod environments.

features.title: Webhooks
features.description: You can now add, update and delete webhooks to use for your departments and your team.

bugfixes: #2889 - Add an 'Are you sure' dialog before resting decrypted variable value
#2889 - Reset variable value when trying to decrypt a variable

features.title: Department owners
features.description: You can now be assigned as a department owner, therefore gaining access to manage the environments and accounts of the departments you own.

features.title: HTML Compare
features.description: You can now see changes in the HTML page code for each step result, this comparison is also controlled by the Screenshot and Compare checkboxes and can be seen by clicking on the <icon>code</icon> icon in the right side of step results list.

bugfixes: #2977 - Update front use patch feature and cleanup api service code
#2759 - Move corresponding logic from FeatureFinished websocket to FeatureRunCompleted

features.title: Last edited sorting
features.description: You can now sort feature in the Search View by their last edition.

features.title: Custom timeout
features.description: You can now type the desired timeout for each step definition instead of the default 60 seconds. This option is provided inside the <icon>more_vert</icon> menu of the step editor.

bugfixes: #2969 - Fix browserstack browser not being available
#2928 - Add parsing support for UTC dates
#2886 - Handle explicit redirection on front

Change log state hotkey

Cleanup not used states and code

Improve Live Steps performance and layout

Improve List view layout

#2946 - Add spinner for clicking run feature

features.title: Email template variables
features.description:
You can now use variables in your email templates, those variables expose information about the feature and the result.
Please click on the help_outline icon inside the Email Template section for more information.

features.title: List view
features.description: We have added a new List view to the main page, this new view is important for those who want a clean view with clear information.

features.title: Send invites
features.description: You can now invite other people to co.meta in the department you choose. This option is available in your User Page.

bugfixes: #2889 - Improve Edit environment variables dialog and tooltips
#2918 - Add pagination for Search View items
Fix translations not working correctly
#2823 - Adapt front to have department folders
#2730 - Fix various issues related to Live Steps
#2797 - Use HTML instead of plain text in Help > Actions
#2811 - Hide 'Can Help' switch in User page if user is only in Default department
#2923 - Fix adding email to SendMail with native autocomplete
#2873 - Add checkbox for optionally delete templates with Clear runs
#2816 - Align 3-dot icons in Result View when customizing headers
#2816 - Fix dynamic table fields shrinking incorrectly
#2816 - Fix read only properties error when changing table headers
#2911 - Fix related features sectionning in Search Page
#2890 - Automatically move feature to folder when creating or clonning
#2908 - Fix step validation for multiline parameters

features.title: Schedule features with in feature
features.description: A new step has been added to the list, which allows users to execute other features with schedule. Step is called Schedule Job "{feature_name}" using parameters "{parameters}" and crontab pattern "{schedule}". Feature_name is the feature that you want to schedule, parameters are key:value pairs separated by semi-colon (;) and finally schedule which is crontab based schedule, schedule can also hold <today> and <tomorrow> which will be dynamically replaced.

features.title: Remove schedule
features.description: Another step has been added which will removed it self from the schedule if the step passes. Step is called Delete schedule that executed this feature.

features.title: Download attached files
features.description: A new step has been added so you can now download files in the feature run and view them from the feature result and step results view. This step is called Download a file by clicking on "<selector>"

bugfixes: #2895 - Fix invalid steps popup after reparsing actions
#2875 - Fix invalid time error everywhere
#2663 - Add anonymous author of sentences
#2881 - Sort Admin items by ascending name
#2881 - Fix adding items in Admin resulting in doubled items
#2881 - Fix adding new feature from Admin panel
#2881 - Fix cancelling modify user resulting in abnormal behavior

features.title: Results table customization
features.description: You can now customize the results table columns and its order by clicking on the three dot menu in the header > Table customization

bugfixes: #2815 - Improve feature run status behavior

features.title: Ask for help
features.description: Now you can mark a feature with "Ask for help", it allows any other user who enabled "I can help" in his profile to assist you on a feature.

features.title: Override steps status
features.description: As we added overriding options for Feature Runs and Feature Results, you can now also override Step Result status.

bugfixes: #2663 - Show captcha box on welcome only if some provider needs it
Fix getting languages not supported
Enable Live Steps to be closed by ESC
#2864 - Add detailed error messages when creating/saving feature, focus and scroll
About - Fix language not being saved in State
#2865 - Add protocol validation for actions URLs

features.title: Milliseconds formatting
features.description: The execution times have extended so that steps with less than 1 second of execution can display values in milliseconds.

features.title: Override results status
features.description: You can now override every result status by clicking on the status tag, the default option of overriding will make the result/run status be recalculated or left as the original value

bugfixes: #2809 - Fix showing commented steps on Live Steps

features.title: Live Steps Timeout
features.description: A timeout text of 30 seconds has been added to be shown in Live Steps when Backend creates a new run but Behave isn't able to create/get a container to run it.

bugfixes: #2663 - Create welcome.html with captcha
#2803 - Change poster of What's New
#2826 - Fix jumping pagination when navigating between pages

features.title: Paginated items
features.description: A new system of pagination has been developed and will be integrated in co.meta from now on. At the time of this writing it is implemented already in Step Result list view.

bugfixes: #2826 - Step Result view - Get overview stats from Feature Result instead of calculated value from step list
#2813 - Fix saving feature info in state after being created
#2755 - Fix user page tour section
#2803 - Change What's New post image

features.title: Welcome page
features.description: A new page named welcome has been added for new users not yet logged in.

features.title: Changelog overview
features.description: From now on, you will see a popup explaining new features, changes and patches. Every new feature has an explanation of how it works and how to experiment with it. This popup is shown whenever there are some important changes and will continue to be displayed until you close it.

features.title: See tour again
features.description: You can now repeat a tour by going to your User page and clicking on See again button of completed tours.

bugfixes: #2759 - Improve SocketService behavior
#2759 - Show to the user the status connection of WebSockets
#2759 - Solve error happening in console when received a result message without feature run context
#2759 - Send user info with WebSocket connection

features.title: See tour later
features.description: We have placed a button to temporarily skip a tours, if you use See later the tour will be delayed until next day.

features.title: Achievements system
features.description: A new achievements system has been implemented, you can see which achivements have you earned by going to your User page.
